name: Woodrose

topics.response_text: Damn, you are wet behind the ears. Jackson leads us, and don't you forget. When he talks, you listen up and catch every word!

topics.topic_text: Why did you attack the mansion?
topics.response_text: Jackson said he saw its destruction in a vision. There were some concerns, but when the leader says it's a mandate from beyond, you don't ask why.

topics.topic_text: Why do you grow so much Punga here?
topics.response_text: Are you kidding? Why wouldn't we? As much as we want to reject earthly desires, we still need to eat, right?

topics.topic_text: What do you do in this tribe?
topics.response_text: I'm denmother. I keep us safe and make sure everyone remembers to eat and sleep. It's more work than you might think.
Not so fast, grub. You haven't earned the right to go to the transcendent master's retreat.
Please wait until my meditations are complete.

conversation.response_text: Blessings to you on your journey.

description:
Woodrose is a 22 year-old Hispanic Female.

Woodrose is the tribe mother of the local tribals in Point Lookout. A young but respected leader, she tends to hydroponic punga plants and cultivates new strains for the tribe. Woodrose cares for tribals who have undergone lobotomies, assisting with their basic needs. While generally thoughtful and timid, she displays hostility toward outsiders.

Woodrose's Personality: Timid yet thoughtful, Woodrose carries the weight of her tribal responsibilities with quiet determination. She is protective of her people and suspicious of outsiders, though she shows compassion toward the vulnerable members of her tribe.

Woodrose's Backstory: Born into the Point Lookout tribals, Woodrose showed an early aptitude for plant cultivation and healing. When previous tribal leadership faltered, she stepped up to become the tribe mother, earning respect through her practical wisdom and genuine care for her people. She maintains the tribe's traditions while quietly working to improve their quality of life through agricultural innovation.
